item.title: Replacing Google Play Music
item.description: Google has officially killed their popular music streaming service Google Play Music and replaced it with their YouTube Music service, and as awesome as YouTube can be it just does not quite cut it for me and thus this documents my trials and tribulations while seeking my own replacement.
